long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Gmail™: create, reuse, personalize templates with placeholders & dynamic fields. Share with your team to stay on the same page!

📧 Shared Email Templates is here to boost your Gmail™! Designed for seamless communication, it lets you create, customize, reuse email presets, and share them across your teams. No more repetitive typing or scattered drafts — only consistent, on-brand emails every time. Perfect for busy teams, customer support, sales, and anyone who sends a lot of emails!

KEY FEATURES
- Instant replies, impeccable quality
- Smart placeholders
- Template shortcuts
- Macros & Automation
- Dynamic attach files & folders
- Pull live data from Google Sheets™
- Share email templates across team
- Manage team access
- Encrypted drafts

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT
⚡ No more hunting through Gmail™ Drafts!
Group related templates in folders making them easy to find from a special sidebar. You will quickly edit and use the presets without breaking your focus or sacrificing the email quality.

🎨 Fillable fields in Gmail™ templates
Use interactive fillable fields for fast, dynamic personalization. Select dates, input names, or choose from lists — all with just a click reducing manual input and mistakes.

⏱️ Template shortcuts to save even more time
Create reusable shortcuts for commonly used phrases or sections, like greetings or sign-offs, and insert them into any email with just one button.

⚙️ Automate routine emails with powerful macros
Attach files, include images, populate email fields, or add personalized details — either instantly or via interactive prompts when inserting a template. Focus on crafting meaningful emails while macros do the heavy lifting.

📎 Add the right files, every time
Pull files and folders straight from Google Drive™ or URLs, and even set reminders to attach files when using email presets.

📊 Data integration with Google Sheets™
Pull live data like names, order numbers, or any custom fields directly from your tables into your email presets. With just a click, your Gmail™ templates are ready to go with the latest details — perfect for bulk emails or individual outreach.

👥 Share Gmail™ templates with your team
Control access and editing permissions to keep all shared email templates secure. Keep your brand consistent and add a professional touch to every email — all without leaving your compose window.

🔐 Your templates are truly private
Your data stays yours — fully encrypted and accessible only to your account or team. Privacy and control are guaranteed.

With Shared Email Templates in Gmail™, you will:
- communicate faster & more effectively
- reduce errors with consistent, reusable templates
- save time by automating emails & replies

Install Shared Email Templates for Gmail™ today to start your free 60-day trial and see how much easier emails can be!
